data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 9,591 believers in the state of Saint James the wisdom of how to form simple, reproducible churches of 12-30 in every neighborhood.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Saint James, Barbados
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Lord of the Harvest, please send out workers into the the state of Saint James, Barbados.
data.verse: Then he said to his disciples, “The harvest is plentiful but the workers are few. Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.section_summary: On average, 2 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who might know about God culturally, but likely have no relationship with Jesus in Saint James, Barbados.
data.prayer: Spirit, reveal yourself to these new families.
Father, convict the 9,591 believers in Saint James to be holy and righteous. Inspire them to gather in small groups for accountability and spiritual growth.
Please, convict the 9,591 believers in Saint James, Barbados to look to you as their only hope for strength and fruitfulness and life.
data.verse: "I am the vine; you are the branches. If you remain in me and I in you, you will bear much fruit; apart from me you can do nothing.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Holetown
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Holetown, Saint James, Barbados.
Father, you said, "The earth belongs to Me and all that is in it". Please, call Saint James, Barbados into obedience and eternal life.
data.verse: The earth is Yahweh’s, with its fullness; the world, and those who dwell therein.

data.prayer: Lord, teach the disciples in the state of Saint James to trust your Word, like a lamp, in the darkness around them.
data.verse: your Word is a lamp for my feet, a light on my path.

data.section_summary:
the state of Saint James, Barbados has a population of 28,500.

We estimate Saint James has 9,591 people who might know Jesus, 16,802 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 2,107 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 2 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: There are 28,500 people living in the state of Saint James. Only about 9,591 might be believers.
